title: Quantitative or Qualitative?
text: We want to determine the type of car you drive. We can determine if this is qualitative or quantitative since qualitative data usually uses data while quantitative involves counting or measuring numerical values.
speech: We want to determine the type of car you drive. We can determine if this is qualitative or quantitative since qualitative data usually uses data while quantitative involves counting or measuring numerical values.

title: Quantitative or Qualitative?
